name: No More Heroes 2: Desperate Struggle
overview: Continue the fight in the HD remaster of the sequel to the original assassin action game! Three years after Travis Touchdown was ranked #1 by the United Assassins Association, he finds himself falling down the ranks to #51. To make things worse, another assassin—Skelter Helter—swears revenge against Travis for the death of his brother. Fueled by his own desires and a thirst for vengeance, the ultimate otaku assassin unsheathes his beam katana once again and plunges headfirst into an all-new battle! • Dual-wield beam katanas as Travis Touchdown to dial the hack-and-slash insanity up to 11! • Jump through combat as the agile Shinobu or leave foes in the dust as Travis' brother, Henry. • Experience a blast from the past by playing 8-bit minigames to earn money and power up!
